mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM review WHERE apply_id= #{applyId}

SELECT review.review_id AS reviewId, review.apply_id AS applyId, review.cust_id AS custId, cust.img AS custImg, contents.title AS title, review.image1, review.image2, review.image3, review.keyword1, review.keyword2, review.keyword3, review.review_contents AS reviewContents, review.review_score AS reviewScore, review.rdate FROM review INNER JOIN apply ON review.apply_id = apply.apply_id INNER JOIN contents ON apply.contents_id = contents.id INNER JOIN cust ON review.cust_id = cust.cust_id ORDER BY review.review_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (apply_id, cust_id, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, review_contents, review_score, rdate) VALUES(#{applyId}, #{custId}, #{keyword1}, #{keyword2}, #{keyword3}, #{reviewContents}, #{reviewScore}, NOW());
